snippet: The five-seat electric vehicle, on display during the New York auto show, is being tested by Hertz in its rental fleet in Shenzhen, China.
abstract: The five-seat electric vehicle, on display during the New York auto show, is being tested by Hertz in its rental fleet in Shenzhen, China.

headline.main: With Help From Hertz, BYD E6 Makes Inroads in New York and Shenzhen
headline.print_headline: The Blog: BYD Makes Inroads, With Hertz’s Help
